oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Music Hall of Fame Series - Tape 5
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of the Music Hall of Fame series tape number five. The recordings are from Decca Records and MCA Records. Tape consists of performances of Tex Ritter (musician), Jimmie Davis (musician) and Floyd Tillman (musician). The recordings are from an unidentified date.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Tex Ritter; Jimmie Davis; Floyd Tillman
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Nobody's Darling but Mine (Tex Ritter) -- (02:57) Down the Oregon Trail (Tex Ritter) -- (06:16) Headin' for the Rio Grande (Tex Ritter) -- (08:51) Arizona Days (Tex Ritter) -- (11:35) Thirty Three Years in Prison (Tex Ritter) -- (14:48) I'm a do Right Cowboy (Tex Ritter) -- (17:54) The Mountains Will See Her Face No More (Floyd Tillman) -- (21:08) There's a Chill on the Hill Tonight (Jimmie Davis) -- (24:11) Bang Bang (Jimmie Davis) -- (27:07) The Last Letter (Jimmie Davis)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Ritter, Tex; Ritter, Tex, 1905-1974; Davis, Jimmie; Davis, Jimmie, 1899-2000; Tillman, Floyd;
